question: [Study] Portugues: Informe which integer bin occurs most frequently com base no histograma.

qas.question: [Study] Portugues: Informe which integer bin occurs most frequently com base no histograma.
[Detailed] Deutsch: Gib how many samples were used in total anhand des Histogramms an.
[Focus] Portugues: Informe how many entries fall inside the modal bin com base no histograma.
